project_path.MetaGearToken: contracts/Verichains Public Audit Report - MetaGear Token - v1/MetaGearToken

findings.title: Unnecessary usage of SafeMath library in Solidity 0.8.0+
findings.description: The contract uses SafeMath library for overflow checking, which is not necessary in Solidity 0.8.0+ as it is done by default.

findings.title: Potential security issues with LiquidityProtection_beforeTokenTransfer function
findings.description: The LiquidityProtection_beforeTokenTransfer function may contain security-related issues, but it is not exploitable in the current context.
